-| diffsc(s1, c1)
-| diffss(s0, s1)

comment: A condition implying that two Hilbert space operators are equal. Lemma 3.2(S9) of [Beran] p. 95. (Contributed by NM, 15-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
